About Us

CONNECTED CONSULTING WEB SOLUTIONS

Giving Small Businesses The Big Business Treatment

At Connected Consulting, we are dedicated to helping small businesses achieve their goals through exceptional marketing and web development services. Founded by Nichole Francis, our business is committed to staying true to small businesses and their values. We believe in empowering our clients to succeed and provide tailored web development services to meet their specific needs. Collaboration and communication are key to our success, and we work closely with our clients to ensure their goals are met.

Our subscription-based service offers affordable monthly rates for exceptional marketing and web development support. Our team stays up-to-date with the latest trends and technology in the web development industry to provide the best service possible. We offer an easy, hassle-free solution to take the workload off your shoulders, providing access to our expert team of professionals. Let us be your trusted partner in building the business you've always dreamed of. Contact us today to learn more about how we can help you achieve your web development goals.
